name: Volcanic Sniper
author: SaltMcSnark
notes: Was determined to KoG with Snipe-Volcanics and I managed to do it in 53 games... it could have been much faster if Snipe Hunter would have just cooperated. The deck is essentially the same as the decks posted in the channel, but since I was seeing a ton of CAffira and Hazy I threw in some support against those decks.
